title: Untitled script
content:
hi,   
I'd really appreciate it if you could comment on my script bitmap font,   
is it something you would like to use?   
does it look too much like all the other script bitmap fonts out there?   
have any idea what to call it?   
   
 ![script-bitmap](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414144218im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/9046.gif)   
   
thanks in advance,   
   
Daia   
 [www.reykjalin.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414144218/http:/www.reykjalin.com/)
author: daia

comments.content:
I have a name for it.. broderi   
I don't think that name is taken but please tell me if it is. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414144218im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
no comments?
